title: Premiere: Edward R – Wolves and the Water
content:
Melbourne’s Edward R becomes the latest act to emerge from Australia with a peach of a debut track, in the form of the exquisitely rousing Wolves and the Water.

It’s explosive and exciting, combining the call-to-arms dynamism of WU LYF and the sort of chorus that’s just begging to be played out to thousands from festival stages. Early days, yet this addictive, euphoric first outing suggests that Edward R is definitely a name to keep an eye on. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
